name: Easy ADS or Text
author: Duid Hamburg AG.

sections.description: Easily insert ads (Google Adsense and other), any text, image or html. On any page without problems, just a few clicks. Everything is very simple and easy, use flexible display filters. You can even limit the display by the number of views.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the archive with the plugin
  2. Upload the plugin folder to the / wp-content / plugins / directory on your server
  3. Activate the plugin in the plugins section in the WordPress admin panel

short_description: Easily insert ads (Google Adsense and other), any text, image or html. On any page without problems, just a few clicks.
